Cover.get you fav: Get Your Favourite Thai Food Delivered to Your Doorstep from Siam Restaurant! Enjoy the taste of your favourite Thai cuisine from the comfort of your own home.

popular.discover: Discover the essence of Thailand in every bite at Siam, your premier destination for authentic Thai cuisine in Dubai. Whether you are craving classic dishes or modern takes on traditional flavors, our restaurant offers a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for any occasion.

visit.choose: Come and choose your favorite thai food
visit.Experience the authentic: Experience the authentic flavors of Thailand at Siam, located in the heart of Dubai. Our restaurant offers a cozy ambiance, perfect for enjoying a delicious meal with family and friends. From classic dishes to contemporary Thai cuisine, there is something for everyone.

footer.discover: Discover the essence of Thailand in every bite at Siam, your premier destination for authentic Thai cuisine in Dubai. Whether you are craving classic dishes or modern takes on traditional flavors, our restaurant offers a warm and inviting atmosphere perfect for any occasion.
footer.we are open: we are open every day to serve you the best thai food in dubai.
footer.address1: Marina Cubes Street - Port Rashid, Dubai
footer.address2: Flayva Food Hall, Al Ghurair Centre, Dubai
